revised_title: The Absorption Spectra of Alkaloids: A New Method for Identifying and Assessing Purity
tldr: The author investigates the absorption spectra of various alkaloids using a novel method involving the action of ultra-violet rays. This method allows for the identification, assessment of purity, and estimation of quantity of alkaloids in solutions. The study also reveals differences in absorption spectra based on molecular structure and chemical constitution of the alkaloids.
